      • setSpeedToMeterPerSecond

        public static void setSpeedToMeterPerSecond(java.util.List<Runner> runners)
        Change the speed of all the runs to m/s. Print all the runs before the change and after the change. Use a method reference for the printing. (hint: Run has a toString() method already.)

        This is a nice exercise to see in which order your stream gets parsed.

        Key = Name

      • heightStatistics

        public static java.lang.String heightStatistics(java.util.List<Runner> runners)
        Print the name and height of each runner. Use a custom collector to append the Strings

        Example: Sam : 1.73m Tony : 1.89m ...

        Parameters:
        runners -
        Returns:
        String containing the name and height of each runner
